sentences.sContent: In parenthesis, I should add that the results have not yet been proven.
sentences.sCn: 插一句，我想补充的是这些结果还未得到证实。

words.tran: 插句的；附加说明的；放在括号里的
附带说明地；作为插入成分地；顺便说一句

trans.tranOther: if you say something in parenthesis, you say it while you are talking about something else in order to add information or explain something
